subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox’ comeback from a 4-0 deficit began with a home run in the seventh inning. The winning run was scored when pitcher Jim Miller threw away a bunt for a game-ending error.
snippet: The Red Sox’ comeback from a 4-0 deficit began with a home run in the seventh inning. The winning run was scored when pitcher Jim Miller threw away a bunt for a game-ending error.
